topComments.comment: Un hermoso lugar con diferentes atracciones para todas las edades, el lugar es bien limpio y adem√°s hay muchas opciones al momento de comer algo. La verdad que lo recomiendo al üíØ por üíØ. La pasamos s√∫per incre√≠ble.

topComments.author: Peter Romanski
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Venho aqui h√° pelo menos 20 anos. O melhor dia para ir √© em dias nublados com possibilidade de chuva. Sim, estava um pouco arejado e frio em alguns momentos, mas para minha surpresa, eles t√™m √°gua aquecida agora. Ent√£o, na maioria das coisas que fizemos, a √°gua estava bastante quente. Ou isso ou parecia quente em compara√ß√£o com o vento/clima, mas sempre me lembro da √°gua gelada, o que n√£o era. Conseguimos fazer todos os passeios em um per√≠odo de 3,5 horas, com exce√ß√£o de dois dos passeios menores, mas est√°vamos bem com isso. Priorizamos os passeios e passamos alguns minutos do tempo extra que t√≠nhamos na piscina de ondas e no rio lento, respectivamente. Optou pelo passe de temporada de ouro porque acredite ou n√£o, era mais barato para duas pessoas com estacionamento levado em considera√ß√£o. Voc√™ ganha um passe gr√°tis para trazer um amigo com ouro ou platina, ent√£o foi isso que eu fiz. Al√©m disso, voc√™ recebe recargas de 99c e 10% de desconto em alimentos. Como o ver√£o est√° apenas come√ßando, agora posso voltar a qualquer momento antes do final da temporada, o que me motivar√° a fazer mais algumas viagens por a√≠. Sempre um bom tempo no Splish Splash.  (Original) Been coming here for at least 20 years. The best day to go is on cloudy days with a chance of rain. Yeah, it was a little breezy and cold at some moments but to my surprise, they have heated water now. So most of the stuff we went on, the water was fairly warm. Either that or it felt warm in comparison to the wind/weather, but I always remember the water being ice cold, which it wasn't. We were able to hit all rides in a 3.5 hr span with the exception of two of the smaller rides but we were ok with that. We prioritized rides and spent a few minutes of whatever extra time we had in the wave pool and lazy river, respectively. Opted for the gold season pass because believe it or not, it was cheaper for two people with parking taken into consideration. You get a free pass to bring a friend with the gold or platinum, so thats what i did. Plus you get 99c refills and 10% off food. Since summer is just beginning, I now can go back anytime before the end of the season which will motivate me to make a couple more trips out there. Always a good time at Splish Splash.

topComments.author: Niko DiPaola

(Original) It was a very hot day so splish splash was insanely packed. The kids had a great time and the park was very clean. My only complaint is I waited over an hour on line for food. topComments.author: Tahmina Aripova
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o √© necess√°ria m√°scara, traga seus pr√≥prios sapatos de mergulho, se os tiver. Ent√£o, infelizmente, quando n√≥s visitamos este lugar estava frio ü•∂, mas de outro ponto n√≥s n√£o tivemos nenhuma fila para esperar. Em algumas das viagens n√≥s pedalamos algumas vezes. No geral, o lugar √© bom, eu n√£o diria que √© enorme, mas √© uma boa viagem de um dia para desfrutar. Eles fecham √†s 17h18, portanto planeje-se adequadamente e chegue mais cedo.  (Original) No mask required, bring your own dive shoes, if you have them. So unfortunately when we did visit this place it was cold ü•∂, but from another point we had no lines to wait. On some of the ride we did ride couple of times. Overall place is good, I would not say it is huge, but it is nice day trip to enjoy. topComments.author: Milagro Gonzalez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu fui com a viagem da escola da minha filha em um domingo e porque o tempo estava quente demais pela manh√£, n√£o havia muitas pessoas no parque. Conseguimos fazer todos os passeios nas primeiras 2 horas. Parque bastante incr√≠vel, adoro os passeios e todos os adolescentes que vieram na viagem se divertiram muito. Devo dizer que a √°gua estava bastante fria pela manh√£, mas nos acostumamos rapidamente. Um parque que recomendo para todas as idades.  (Original) I went with my daughter's school trip it on a Sunday and because the weather was just hot too hot in the morning not many people were in the park. We were able to get on all the rides within the first 2 hours.  Pretty awesome park, love the rides and all the teens that came on the trip had an amazing time. I have to say the water was quite cold in the morning but we to used to it pretty quickly.  A park I recommend for all ages.

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) passeios s√£o legais. alguns realmente incr√≠veis.Eu entendo que os neg√≥cios t√™m que ganhar dinheiro, mas eu n√£o entendo por que √°gua engarrafada simples e gatorade n√£o s√£o permitidos, ent√£o eles querem cobrar $ 4 por garrafa. insano! e uma experi√™ncia ruim foi que, depois de esperar quase 2 horas para entrar em um dos mais populares, desligaram √†s 17 horas e a espera foi em v√£o. isso foi muito chato e decepcionante. se voc√™ me perguntar, diria ir para o parque dorney  (Original) rides are cool. some really amazing.i understand business gotta make money but i dnt understand why simple bottled water and gatorade are not allowed, then they wanna charge you $4 a bottle inside. insane! and one bad experience was that, after waiting almost 2 hrs to get onto one of the popular ones, they shut it off for 5pm and the wait was in vain. that was pretty annoying and disappointing. id say go to dorney park if you ask me

Eles t√™m passes H2go ou fazem o que eu planejo ir durante a semana e evitar fins de semana  (Original) Awesome water park! Clean, lots of attraction and very safe. Unfortunately because it's so awesome the lines for the rides can get very long. They do have H2go passes or do what I do plan to go during the week and avoid weekends

topComments.author: Luke Spencer Avdoulos
topComments.comment: Love this place so much, I go here w my family and friends every summer multiple times and it's always a blast.  Great food, awesome rides, pretty good theming and tons of fun. Some lines are long but if you get the H20 fast pass things are a lot better.  It's pretty affordable and super great always totally recommend

topComments.author: Treasures of A Gemini
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Minha fam√≠lia teve uma explos√£o. Eles t√™m arm√°rios dispon√≠veis para compra. De grosseiro, algu√©m sempre esquece alguma coisa, ent√£o eles t√™m lojas onde voc√™ pode comprar sapatos de √°gua ou roupas de banho. Chegue cedo ou ter√° que estacionar nos fundos. Confie em mim, a caminhada √© longa depois de um longo dia no parque aqu√°tico.  (Original) My family had a blast. They have lockers available for purchase. Of coarse, someone always forgets something, so they have shops where you can purchase water shoes or swimming wear. Get there early or you‚Äôll have to park in the back. Trust me, the walk is long after a long day at the water park.

topComments.author: Ryan Sweeney
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ok, ent√£o... De alguma forma eu classifiquei uma estrela pela minha experi√™ncia no Splish Splash. Foi um erro, minhas desculpas. A viagem foi √≥tima, conseguimos uma boa Cabana com funcion√°rios atenciosos e atenciosos que cuidaram muito bem de n√≥s. Os pre√ßos das bebidas eram um pouco altos, mas era esperado. Meu √∫nico problema foi a conta de comida e bebida no final de nossa estadia n√£o tinha uma se√ß√£o de gorjeta como um restaurante regular. Ningu√©m do meu grupo trouxe dinheiro para cuidar da equipe, pois o parque n√£o aceita, nem mesmo para comprar ingressos. Avan√ßando, a conta da Cabana precisa de uma se√ß√£o de dicas e darei 5 estrelas na pr√≥xima vez.  (Original) Okay so... Somehow I pocket rated one star for my experience at Splish Splash. This was an error, my apologies. The trip was great, we got a nice Cabana with kind attentive staff that took great care of us. The drink prices were a bit high, yet it was expected. My only issue was the food and drink bill at the end of our stay did not have a tip section like a regular restaurant. No one from my party brought cash to take care of the staff as the park doesn't really accept it, even to buy tickets. Moving forward, the Cabana bill needs a tip section and I will give you 5 stars next time.

topComments.author: Rayelle Johnson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Grande Parque. Basta comprar o passe de temporada, pois definitivamente n√£o h√° tempo suficiente em um dia para experimentar todos os passeios. Mesmo quando voc√™ pensou que viu todos eles, h√° outro escondido atr√°s de algumas √°rvores. Sapatos de √°gua para que voc√™ n√£o precise se preocupar em colocar e tirar os sapatos. Imprima um mapa do parque e CHEGUE CEDO e fique at√© O FINAL. Eu amo que h√° uma √°rea para os pequenos se divertirem.  (Original) Great Park. Just buy the season pass as there is definitely not enough time in a day to try all of the rides. Even when you thought you saw all of them there is another one hidden behind some trees. Water shoes so you don‚Äôt have to worry about taking ur shoes on and off. Print a map of the park and COME EARLY and stay until THE END. I love that there is an area for little ones to enjoy.
